text: Mr. Lucky is an American adventure drama series that aired from October 24, 1959 to June 18, 1960 on CBS. It stars John Vivyan, Ross Martin, Tom Brown, Pippa Scott and was created by Blake Edwards. ==Other websites== * Category:American drama television series Category:CBS network shows Category:1950s television series Category:1960s television series Category:1959 television series debuts Category:1960 television series endings Category:English-language television programs
title: Mr. Lucky (TV series)
